items.sentence: I know you probably want to be alone, so I\'ll leave.
I thought Tom and Mary were supposed to be in Boston.
I thought Tom would go with you on your camping trip.
I used to be able to see the garden from this window.
I used to live in the same apartment building as Tom.
I used to work in a restaurant when I was in college.
I wish I had the will power to stop eating junk food.
Tom opened the door to see what the weather was like.
Tom opened the medicine cabinet, looking for aspirin.
Tom patiently tried to explain the situation to Mary.
